com.netbuilder.Service

Class GenreRandomPlayQueueArray

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.netbuilder.Service.PlayQueueArray
      • com.netbuilder.Service.RandomPlayQueueArray
        • com.netbuilder.Service.GenreRandomPlayQueueArray

  • public class GenreRandomPlayQueueArray
extends RandomPlayQueueArray
    This class contains methods to deal with the playQueue in an admin context to set shuffle mode on and off but for playlists set by genre so that the admin can set and atmosphere This class is a child of RandomPlayQueueArray which is a child of PlayQueueArray because they can share the same list playQueue and calls the same methods (playSongsFromQueue) that take different inputs
    Version:
    Author:
    Bruce Pannaman

      java.util.List<Music> SetOfGenreShufflePlaylist(java.lang.String genreSelection)

    • Method Detail

      • SetOfGenreShufflePlaylist

        public java.util.List<Music> SetOfGenreShufflePlaylist(java.lang.String genreSelection)
        This method gets all the songs from the database, makes a random playlist out the songs matching the genre parameter them then adds them to playQueue. It then prepares each element of the playQueue to be played using preparePlayQueueToBePlayed method
        Parameters:
        genreSelection -
        Returns:
